title: Best Served Cold
description: Book One in the Cold Play SeriesIn Athens, Greece, the nights are long and the days are hot…Revenge may be best served cold, but Dr. Keefe Pearson is burning up for the one man who can destroy her plans to get back at her worst enemy.What should have been a very clear CIA assignment for cold-as-ice Evan Jahnning turns dangerous as his sexual attraction for Keefe heats up, placing her square in the sights of the world’s most ruthless power broker.Keefe is determined to get Jahnning in her bed, and he’s sure that’s the one place he can learn all her secrets.
author: Eliza Lloyd
